page.title: 04Education in two counties
page.content: In Somerset,two young children are taken to Dulverton First School 3.5 miles away.They will go at the age of 9 to Dulverton Middle School and aged 13 to West Somerset School,Minehead,a comprehensive with a sixth form 22 miles away. Two teenage boys are already at Minehead and one girl is a student at London University. Nearer the Devon,Somerset border there is more variation.Children attend primary schools in Anstey, Bampton and Rackenford and go to Bampton Middle School and to Tiverton Comprehensive School. One teenage boy goes to Plymouth College and another to a day_release course. In this corner of Somerset, at least 5 young people under 30 have graduated,only one, an agricultural graduate works in this area.
